channel.title: FoL Interest Polls Thread
channel.description:
As Hippolytus suggested in the FoL January Changes thread, we've decided to create a thread for gauging interest for changes in FoL. If you have a suggestion for change, simply reply in this thread with your suggestion, and we'll add a poll for it ASAP, so that you and other users can vote on what you would like to see changed in FoL. I'll start off with an obvious one: ### Should The Fool's passive "Poor Fellow" be changed? [poll type=regular public=true name="Change Poor Fellow"] * Change Poor Fellow * Don't change Poor Fellow [/poll]
---
### If "Poor Fellow" is changed, what should it be changed to? (Suggest additional options if neither of these is satisfactory) #### Option 1, current ToL version: > **Poor Fellow (Passive)** - If you are executed before Day 4, the court will be unable to execute for the following two days, otherwise they will be unable to execute for one day.
#### Option 2, 1 day effect: > **Poor Fellow (Passive)** - If you are executed the court will unable to execute for one day.
#### Option 3: > **Poor Fellow (Passive)** - If you are executed by the court, those who accused you of treason will be unable to vote at all for the following day. Those blocked from voting do not count towards majority.
#### Option 4: > **Poor Fellow (Passive)** - If you are executed by the court, players who voted you to trial will be occupied that following night while they are in mourning and will swear off trials the next day (cannot vote). [poll type=regular public=true name="Change Options"] * Option 1 * Option 2 [/poll] New poll [here](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-interest-polls-thread/37113/14).
---

item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I was thinking permanent, and that’s be night immunity, poison/bleed immunity and occupy immunity. Not against reducing it if need be. The ability will be silent, so you won’t know it has happened until a situation arises when it is relevant.

No, you must outlive 3 people who accused you of treason.

item.title: FoL Interest Polls Thread
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Moleland:

A ‘Target’ loses any form of immunities they’d normally have

For how long and can you post an exhaustive list of what immunities this removes?

Moleland:

Goal: Outlive 3 ‘Targets’ and survive until the end of the game.

If less than 3 people ever vote for you then can you win?

Read full topic

item.title: FoL Interest Polls Thread
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I was just thinking of a potential new class. I’d say it was a Neutral Offensive…

Spiteful Egotist

Passive 1: Massive Ego - Immune to death at night
Passive 2: Wounded Pride - Anyone who accuses you of treason becomes a target

Day ability: Grudge - A ‘Target’ loses any form of immunities they’d normally have (Night, occupation, Invest etc) - 2 uses

Night ability: Spite - Occupy a ‘target’ (2 uses)

Goal: Outlive 3 ‘Targets’ and survive until the end of the game.

Read full topic

item.title: FoL Interest Polls Thread
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
We should have a new type of FoL called EFoL, experimental forum of lies. The host could introduce a few changes that they think could benefit such as changing the king or fool or something.

Atm someone (a mod) thinks of an idea and it goes straight into our main FoL with no testing other then a limited discussion. If we had a game testing changes in a more chill environment instead of immediately adding them to the main game causing unending salt, we could start to iron out a lot of the problems with FoL.

Read full topic

item.title: FoL Interest Polls Thread
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
I’ve made cards for Sorcerer/Inquisitor, with the abilities I think make them work best.

The Sorcerer

Neutral Killer
Perception (Passive) - You will not attack targets that are death immune, were guarded by The Knight, or that are an Unseen/Cult member. You will attack The Inquisitor if they are not being guarded.
Mage Armour (Passive) - Immune to death at night, occupation, target changing, poison and bleeding.
Magic Cloak (Day) - You appear as a member of the Blue Dragon to investigative abilities tonight, and your visits will be hidden from others. - 3 uses
Magic Missile (Night) - Fire a magic missile at a player, killing them. - Infinite uses
Circle of Death (Night) - Everyone visiting target player will die. - 2 uses, not usable before night 3
Survive to see the Blue Dragon lose.

The Inquisitor

Neutral Investigative
Holy Blessing (Passive) - Immune to death at night once.
Nobody Expects The Spanish Inquisition (Passive) - Your visits will be hidden from others at night. Additionally, once The Sorcerer is dead you will not be able to use either of your night abilities.
Find Magic (Night) - Check if a player is a magic user. The Sorcerer, The Paladin, The Court Wizard and The Psychic as well as their converted forms are all magic users. - Infinite uses
Ruthless Efficiency (Night) - Attack a player. If they are a magic user, you will kill them. Bypasses night death immunity. - 3 uses
Survive to see The Sorcerer die.

Should The Sorcerer and The Inquisitor be added to FoL as they are above?

  • Yes
  • No (Explain Why)

0 voters

Read full topic

item.title: FoL Interest Polls Thread
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I am not sure why we need to test it either, seeing as the vast majority do not want it, but it seems we apparently have to. I’d rather have it guaranteed in our next game so we can all move on and forget about it as opposed to having to wait for it to randomly appear every single game before we can confidently dismiss it.

Read full topic
